Title: "Zetsumetsu Kurokami Shōjo"
Notes: Debut with NMB48 Team N. Sang on "Seishun no Lap Time", "Mikazuki no Senaka" and "Boku ga Maketa Natsu" with Shirogumi

Title: "Oh My God!"
Notes: Sang on "Boku wa Matteru" and "Kesshou" with Shirogumi

Title: "Nagiichi"
Notes: Sang on "Saigo no Catharsis" with Shirogumi

Title: "Virginity"
Notes: Sang on "Mōsō Girlfriend" and "Sunahama de Pistol"

Title: "Rashikunai"
Notes: Sang on "Kyusen Kyotei" as Team N.

Title: "Don't look back!"
Notes: Sang on "Renai Petenshi" as Team N. Sang on "Sotsugyō Ryokō" as NMB48's 1st generation.

Title: "Durian Shōnen"
Notes: Sang on "Inochi no Heso" as Team N.

Title: "Must be now"
Notes: Did not sing on title track; Sang on "Yume ni Iro ga nai riyū" as Team N and "Kataomoi Yori mo Omoide wo...".
